jobDescription: About the Role: We are seeking candidates who demonstrate thorough research abilities, air-tight organization, and attention to detail for a comprehensive review of customer and prospect data. Analysts can expect exposure to a variety of business functions. You Will:Conduct in-depth market research on global Accounts and Companies using valid industry sourcesConduct strategic analysis on Accounts to evaluate propensity to buy and sales engagementConduct in-depth analysis on the deal pipeline to look categorize accounts into high-touch and low-touchSubmit and track territory operations cases using an in-house custom tool.Follow-up and ensure resolution to each territory operations case.Run reports and dashboards to highlight Account ownership changes.Required Skills:Rigorous attention to detail1+ years of Salesforce and/or Excel experience (Reports, Dashboards, Analytics)Strong communication skills, both verbal and writtenQuick learnerHighly organizedStrong problem solving skillsAbility to multi-task while managing deadlines, to perform well under pressure and to work independently and as a part of a teamAnalytically inclinedDesired Skills:Bachelor's Degree1+ years of experience with data cleansing or database management
